What a fucking waste!! I eagerly downloaded this... It crops the image from the original 2.35:1 aspect ratio to 1.78:1.. Almost a third of the image is cut from both the sides.. Avoid this shit!! Download the DVD iso file instead... You'll get excellent quality and maintain the aspect ratio

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6285961/Snake.Eyes.1998.MULTiSUBS.DVDR-NightLive

Read title, moron. It is HDTV. NOTHING is cropped, 'el stupido'... 16/9 is BIGGER than 2.35/1, right? But - you can't get that for sure.

But, even for stupid persons - HOW SOMETHING BIGGER IS CROPPED (MADE SMALLER) TO BE MADE BIGGER? Something is wrong there... ROFL.
